name: Branch Free
description:
Grow up and out of the seemingly bottomless pit you find yourself in, during your escape there are glowing bells to collect.

  • Takes roughly 5 minutes to beat.
  • Simple control scheme that supports WASD and Arrow Keys.

Made in roughly two weeks in the Godot Engine with no original goal I aimed to release my first game.

  • Music by Bertsz from Freesound.org
  • Other sounds from Freesound.org
  • Art based on VECTORPIXELSTAR's free art packs
